text: Nils O. Golten (11 May 1936 - 26 March 1999) was a Norwegian politician for the Conservative Party. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Hordaland in 1985, and was re-elected on one occasion. He had previously served in the position of deputy representative during the term 1981-1985\. Golten was born in Sund and a member of Sund municipality council in the periods 1971-1975, 1975-1979 and 1979-1983\. ==References== * Category:1999 deaths Category:Sund, Norway Category:1936 births Category:Conservative Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Nils O. Golten
